articles.title: 'We acted until we were exhausted': Xiang Yun's new drama character has schizophrenia and dementia - AsiaOne

articles.title: Hawker couple in Tampines first met as 'rivals' from opposite stalls - AsiaOne
articles.description: The story of how Ngoh Jook Guan and Ivy Lim got together feels more like a romance film but rest assured, this isn't fiction. They used to be 'rival' hawkers from different stalls at Golden Mile Hawker Centre but that was over a decade ago. Jook Guan was sell…
